name: Pest Control (itch) (Sarahnade)
description:
You are a happy lil farmer gathering crops in a happy lil garden. Try your best to collect your crops and avoid getting overrun by these freaking pests!

This is a very early build so the gameplay is  incomplete! I have plans for equipment upgrades and a progression system. New scenery would be nice. Any feedback or ideas for improvement will be very greatly appreciated!

Have fun!
